price: Ya ce: "Ya ƙaramin ɗãna! Kada ka faɗi mafarkinka ga 'yan'uwanka, har su ƙulla maka wani kaidi. Lalle ne Shaidan ga mutum, haƙĩƙa, maƙiyi ne bayyanãnne.*
arabic: قَالَ يَٰبُنَيَّ لَا تَقۡصُصۡ رُءۡيَاكَ عَلَىٰٓ إِخۡوَتِكَ فَيَكِيدُواْ لَكَ كَيۡدًاۖ إِنَّ ٱلشَّيۡطَٰنَ لِلۡإِنسَٰنِ عَدُوّٞ مُّبِينٞ
footnotes: * Tarbiyyar uba ga ɗansa.Yaro ƙarami anã renon sa da jawãbi mai laushi a fahimtar matsayin yãron.

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: qāla yābunayya lā taqṣuṣ ru'yāka ʿalā ikh'watika fayakīdū laka kaydan inna al-shayṭāna lil'insāni ʿaduwwun mubīnun
